website_summaries.verdict: A good-looking and high-quality option that also doubles as a table.
pros: A 1-2 hour installation that is not overly complicated
Looks great and is made from real wood
Excellent quality, and the drop-leaf is a nice feature
cons: Put felt feet on the bottom if you want to occasionally move it around
Some buyers note that the top can split within a few months

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Get one!
customer_reviews.text: After much searching online & reading countless reviews, I decided to order this. It was so worth it! It wasn't complicated to put together. It took my husband about an hour or so to assemble with no issues. Everyone that comes over has commented on how much they like it & asks where I got it from. I also purchased the suggested stools. They don't match perfectly but it's pretty close. On a side note, I purchased 6 baskets for the side openings of the island at The Container Store that fit PERFECTLY! If you're on the fence about getting a kitchen island, let me make it simple for you....GET THIS ONE!
customer_reviews.author: D.T.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful kitchen island.
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful, and had Amazon professional technician assembled the island. I'm very satisfied with the kitchen island. This was a birthday gift for my mom.
customer_reviews.author: Trustno1

customer_reviews.title: For the money this is poor quality.  The top is cracking and the company will do nothing.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this island when we received it. Now it is developing a crack across the top of the island. Home Styles will do nothing to replace or repair. I hoping that Amazon will be more helpful.
customer_reviews.author: S. D. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Splitting wood
customer_reviews.text: Was very happy with purchase at first, bought Oct 2017, now 5 months later there 2 very large splits in the wood planks glued together to create top portion. Yes the part everyone will see. I am so disappointed. Pics do NOT show how bad the island now looks
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful. Took a bit over an hour tyo put ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful. Took a bit over an hour tyo put together, everything was there, no scratches or dents. All the predrilled holes matched up perfectly with the hardware. I would recommend this island to anyone. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit, needs some wheels
customer_reviews.text: All in all an attractive addition to our kitchen, but there were some quality issues like misplacement of some pilot holes that had to be re-drilled. Not especially easy to assemble, as these things go. The main drawback is the lack of casters. I happened to have four suitable casters and mounted them so that they are recessed underneath and not visible. This lifts the legs about a quarter inch off the floor which is not noticeable. Without the wheels this heavy unit would be a monster to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Vilhelm

customer_reviews.title: Fine piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: First off, there was no cussing as my husband assembled this. Usually a good gauge of the directions and complexity. He had no issues at all and seemed to actually enjoy the process. I am very pleased with how much storage I gained and what a really nice, sturdy and good looking piece of furniture this island is....the only reason it got 4 stars instead of 5 is because there was one flaw where the wood was slightly splintered and unfortunately it was in the front, so it couldn't be hidden. Still, I can live with it and I totally recommend it. The price on Amazon vs others that I compared with was the best too. PLEASED with this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wanting a kitchen island since we moved into our house 5 years ago. This island is absolutely perfect!! My husband and I joke it looks too fancy for our kitchen. The assembly took about an hour or so and the instructions were easy to follow. The craftsmanship on the wood top is absolutely beautiful, and you can tell it was done by hand. One tiny part of the finish has chipped off after 2 weeks of owning this island, but we just rubbed Linseed oil on it to protect it and try to darken it to match the varnish.
customer_reviews.author: night rush

customer_reviews.title: I love it! My husband fought me tooth and nail ...
customer_reviews.text: I looked at so many islands and read reviews and still decided to take a chance with this one! I love it! My husband fought me tooth and nail about ordering furniture online etc and when he got finished putting this together he said you did good I love it! Works for me! Nice piece great quality in my and his opinion. Only piece damaged in shipping you can't see. Happy camper
customer_reviews.author: Everydayshopper00

customer_reviews.title: Homestyles customer support less than friendly
customer_reviews.text: This product arrives in 3 huge boxes. One of my cabinet doors looks like someone tried to put their fist through it. I called Home styles to get a replacement part and the rep was a real witch! Now I have to wait for a replacement while I have about 100 random pieces strewn about my living room
customer_reviews.author: Lexkmw

customer_reviews.title: Had a defect, but if it didn’t would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Wood top looks great, lots of storage, assembly took 1.5hr with 2 people. Got everything together... and the cabinet door refused to close. Went around with customer service for 2 weeks they delivered a door (wrong color) didn’t fix, then delivered the corner post with the other half of the hinge... you have to take apart the whole thing to replace that part.... looks nice but a hassle to redo construction and spend time troubleshooting for what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: meagan ormand

customer_reviews.title: It could be better!!
customer_reviews.text: Was not easy to assemble this island. Took me 2 hours. Is recommended to assemble the island with two people didn't have anyone at the moment to help me. Beware one off the door will not close correctly, even after I contact the manufacture and they sent me a replacement part still didn't close. The top wood will scratch easy, the worst part is maintaining this island clean is a pain. The good is that have plenty of storage is very sturdiness (even with the door not closing) for a small kitchen this island make the kitchen look functional, does not take a lot of space and 4 people can easy eat even with the island full of plates.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Think before you purchase
customer_reviews.text: For pre fabricated, expensive. Expense is relative. Maybe better off going to local store, get American made, pay a extra. Had scratches, cracked wood, un finished paint in sections. Doors not even.
customer_reviews.author: francis a agresti

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and gives extra storage as well as another surface to place things on.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone who sees the unit exclaims about the beautiful wood it is constructed with. I use an oilcloth type cover for the wood work surface.. I would be willing to pay more to get a faux marble top. I would like a top that I could use in cutting, juicing etc ingredients. Despite my suggestions as to what I perceive as shortcomings, I would definitely recommend the island. It adds beauty and and extra storage to your kitchen. It is a high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: jeeca

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful
customer_reviews.text: We took out an island that had come with the house, and unfortunately that left a square of old linoleum that needed to be covered up. The dimensions that we saw on Amazon for this island should have mostly covered it with just an inch or two where the indents are at the base of the cabinet. Unfortunately we had a two inch gap all the way around and had to put in a platform using a different material but it ended up looking good - so, don't count on the dimensions Amazon has given. Otherwise it is a beautiful island, just takes time to get it all together.
customer_reviews.author: Restfinder

customer_reviews.title: Wooden counter top Cracks
customer_reviews.text: Ok so initially I was so excited about this Island once I put it together..BEAUTIFUL. Instructions were easy, nicely packaged, quick delivery! Now, all that glitters is NOT gold. About 3 days after sitting all pretty in my kitchen, the wood counter top began to crack. In several places at that. I called Amazon and they offered to replace it or compensate me. Can’t be mad at that! So I must say they stood by me on this. However, it would have been MUCH better to have a product that was completely up to par with NO issues. Hope the manufacturer corrects this or at least pulls this off the site. Thanks for doing the right thing Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Denyse E. Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Looks fairly attractive but nicks and damage clearly before shipping - was replaced
customer_reviews.text: Not as glossy in appearance as the photo depicts. There was some damage on the top but the company was good about replacement, but it's still a hassle. Also the paint has a really awful smell. I think it's the formaldehyde in the paint. There is a warning about that, so I can't complain, I just didn't know it would be so bad. Other than that, I would say it's fairly attractive. Not top shelf, and not like the photo - perhaps more rustic.
customer_reviews.author: Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and heavy.
customer_reviews.text: The Island came in 3 HUGE boxes, over 3 days. On the carton I purely by accident saw end numbers 1,2, 3.on each box. And the packing slip was helpful. The island itself is beautifully made, but heavy. I put it together alone, using various objects to prop while I was constructing. instructions easy to follow, however, it wasn’t a breeze. I was a job. Ask a friend to help. Paint is good, shelves plentiful. The drawers were prebuilt and slide on metal gliders. I think it’s worth the money, it’s sturdy, and a great addition to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Nelsonsky

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional!
customer_reviews.text: This island is amazing and I never would have found exactly what I was looking for if it wasn’t for Amazon! The wood is solid, heavy and so beautiful. The extra storage I now have has been wonderful. I added two battery motion lights inside so when I open the doors the light turns on. In addition to the chairs with backs that match the island, I purchased two small footprint short stools for each end. The shelves do not present a problem when stools are used. I could not be happier with this island. Don’t hesitate just buy, you will not be disappointed! Love, love, love!!
customer_reviews.author: vic

customer_reviews.title: Antique white, NOT White.. But Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful quality piece of furniture! Gave 4 stars because it was pretty challenging to put together ( not great instructions :/ ) and it is definitely NOT WHITE.. IT IS ANTIQUE WHITE. I didn't care too much even though my cabinets are white because I have antique white furniture throughout my home. They do need to change the description on this from being white to "antique white" instead bc a lot of people would care to know how "white" it actually is. This is a very sturdy piece, not junk, and it is real wood...( Not that particle board crap that you worry about receiving.) Overall very happy with it and am so glad I made this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: VERY UNHAPPY...
customer_reviews.text: This island comes in 3 large boxes. I ordered the Black one, & I found that the paint on this is a very thin coat & is easy scratched off or kicked up if you arnt very very careful while unboxing & putting it together. There were 3 places on 2 of the drawers that were knocked up. The leaf that folds out on this is a different color than the top of the unit as you can see in the pictures. This island is definitely not worth what I paid for it. For this price a person could have a wood worker build an Island that is much nicer for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy The OneTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Great colors, but scratches easily
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the colors of this island, because the white matches our white kitchen appliances and the top matches our oak cabinets. However, the top of this island scratches SO EASILY. The assembly was fine (you will want 2 people) but as soon as we put it in the kitchen, everything would scratch it. For example, we had a small plastic box on top of it, and when I slide it about 4-5 inches to make room for a cutting board, it left long scratches where the box was! I thought it may have been something wrong with the box, but it's every single item we put on it. Kind of a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: micky

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Island - Replaced Wood Top with Granite
customer_reviews.text: We searched and searched to find the perfect island for our kitchen. This is exactly what we were looking for and the price was great, too! We just had a granite top put on it to match our counters and that's taken it to a whole new level. The reason for the 4 stars is because it was missing a few of the little "plugs" that hold up the shelves on the side. We were able to put them in using small nails, but it should have come with all the pieces necessary for assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: a great buy
customer_reviews.text: don't get me wrong, it took 3 attempts to get this island, UPS lost boxes twice and i had to send back and order again, but third time all 3 boxes arrived, looking at 3 huge boxes i was a bit overwhelmed but i unpacked sat on the floor and started putting together, i knew it would take a while but it wasn't hard at all. well labeled, easy instructions, its heavy and sturdy, i wasn't sure whether to buy this Island at first but take my advice, the best decision, BUY IT !!!!!! and you will enjoy it
customer_reviews.author: Titch1973

customer_reviews.title: This island is ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: I would still make this purchase, but I gave it a 3 stars because the doors in front of the island don't line-up very well. One of them has a bigger gap than the other and that is very noticeable. The island itself is strong and well made. The color is not white, but off white. The countertop looks too small for the island, so it looks a little off balance, so I'm replacing it with another wood counter top, but I guess that size would be nice for someone with very small espace. The compartments inside are very small as well.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great item
customer_reviews.text: Island was everything that I hoped for, came quickly, assembled easily. ( I assemble by myself, took about 2.5 hours, I recommend help for a couple steps if you can get some, but I used Styrofoam and cardboard, to prop up different things at times when I had to tip it over for next step.) Mine came with damage on the top, but the seller took care of me, no questions asked. Super great customer service. Would buy again if I ever needed a 2nd island ;)
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE manufacturer support
customer_reviews.text: The left door is too short! (and I saw a review saying the same thing). The screws keeping the drawer faces attached to the front of the drawers are ~1/8” too short and they came off just taking the drawers out of the (preSsembled) top section. I was floored! Did an online request for parts replacement with the POS manufacturer (S Amazon recommends) and they REFUSED to replace the parts, despite detailed pics sent! So now it’s assemvled and I have to DISASSEMBLE the whole friggin’ thing to return it? RIDICULOUS!
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Dual function!
customer_reviews.text: I love this kitchen island, the style, color and functionality. The fact that you can entertain around it and also use it for storage was a big plus for me. It's very sturdy and was easy to set up, so you definitely need 2 people because it's heavy. The parts were clearly marked and there were enough screws to use. The height is perfect and I also loved that you could adjust the height a tad bit. It took us just under an hour to put together. The boxes were well packaged, I just wished it came with a pair of matching stools but other than that it was great investment to my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: High quality and easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product, worth the price, and this one is not from China!! I think the sticker said it was made in Thailand. First off, the parts are quite heavy, suggesting that it is real wood, not some crap. It assembles easily, so I wouldn't pay for that, I think a 10 year old could do it in 2 hours. Nothing was missing, in fact, they included a few extra screws, bolts, etc. Looks exactly like in the picture here, so no cheating there, either. Doesn't take tremendous strength to slide it on tile floor, which helps when you want to put it into a specific spot. I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Love this island!!
customer_reviews.text: This beautiful island was a bit challenging to put together. It required 2 people (in my case, 3) to hold together in order to proceed, in the first half of the steps. Once that hurdle was past, it was smooth sailing to complete the second half of the steps. I have the drop leaf positioned up with two bar chairs underneath. This allows for extra seating in my kitchen. Everyone who enters my home compliments it and I absolutely love the extra space for prepping food, storing kitchen items, and using it to eat on. Love it! :)
customer_reviews.author: Sara Vee

customer_reviews.title: Well Built, Terrible Customer Support.
customer_reviews.text: I had the help of a couple of friends putting this together and It went very well, however whenever we were assembling the table on the island, we realized the attached leaf was a completely different color wood that failed to match the other half. I reached out to support in order to get a matching leaf of the same color and never received a response after emailing the support team. For those who don't know, the leaf is the raisable and lower-able part of the island.
customer_reviews.author: Kayden D.

customer_reviews.title: This Island is perfect for medium sized kitchens.
customer_reviews.text: Our country kitchen isn't small but it's not 'large' either. It's a nice sized space but finding the right sized Island has been a challenge. This one is just right and fits our space perfectly. It gives us plenty of 'extra' storage space and with the two bar stools I've purchased, gives us a great space to have a nice lil' breakfast or lunch when not wanting to eat in the dining room. Love, love, love this Island. Would 'Highly' recommend this item if you have a 'medium' sized kitchen with more limited space.
customer_reviews.author: Erik M. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: this is one of the best item i have purchase from amazon
customer_reviews.text: this is one of the best item i have purchase from amazon I have loved it since then it has a lots of space to organize your kitchen and durable it has been 2 years and i relay felt bad not to leave a review so I`ll tell you now this is the best kitchen island you can get.check out the pictures that i have take today it still looks new
customer_reviews.author: Tedo

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and solid quality for the price . . .
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for an island bar that was well-made, solid, and heavy. After reading reviews, I decided on this purchase. I was not disappointed. It looks great and the price is good for the quality. The fold up extension has sturdy swing out braces that hold it in place. I would suggest two people to assemble. Because the pieces are large and heavy, it would have been difficult for me alone to hold them in place to put together. Everything is well-marked making the project fairly easy. We finished it in about an hour and fifteen minutes. I would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bolden

customer_reviews.title: I would give this company 10 stars if I could
customer_reviews.text: We received this island on July 29 and two parts were missing. I contacted the manufacturer and we received the missing parts on July 30. That is outstanding customer service. It is a beautiful island and very sturdy; It is solid wood. I highly recommend this manufacturer and this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy island but with a few production flaws
customer_reviews.text: Overall not a bad kitchen island, but mine had some flaws in production, you may be more lucky. One piece with a channel for a wall was cut unevenly so I had to jam a side piece in roughly, a set of pre-drilled holes were misaligned, and one door doesn't sit perfectly in place so it bangs into the center wall (second picture). Overall it seems like it's built to last, however you'll probably need a hand assembling it if you aren't stubborn like me.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Is everyone color blind or did they change the color?!
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to receive this until I opened the box! The description says it's white yet it is a cream color. I ordered the stools that were suggested with the purchase and they are the color I expected. Unfortunately the island that arrived the next day was a totally different color! So now what? Take back the stools or the island? All the reviews and answered questions claim it is the same color as any white appliance. You can judge that for yourself from my picture. You can clearly see how the stool looks nothing like the island! Very frustrated. Oh, and the paint off the base is cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: My 16 year old daughter and I assembled, she did most of the work :), went together pretty easy. Added pull out shelves (wire basket on tracks) to the bottom of both cabinets (that took a bit of maneuvering) but we love how much storage we have. Would highly recommend for someone looking for an island. Glad I made this purchase, NO REGRETS.
customer_reviews.author: Jacki Miskus

customer_reviews.title: Great quality construction, but a little tricky to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality construction, but a little tricky to assemble. The assembly is not complicated, but holding everything in place while fastening the cam-locks is much easier with 2 people, although if you are resourceful and clever, you can do it by yourself. Mostly painted solid wood, although some of the panels are pressed wood. It's a $650 island, so it's nicer than what you'll get at Walmart for $200, but it's not a $2000 island. You get what you pay for here.
customer_reviews.author: idcipher106

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is a challenge!
customer_reviews.text: Laying on its back to assemble the legs isn't easy, because of the uneven surfaces. We had to set upright, tip and teach under to attach them. This becomes more difficult when our bodies aren't as limber as they once were! The threaded plastic inserts pulled out and needed re anchoring. The internal cabinet fasteners tended to be another challenge; striped two before finding the exact tool. Instructions were of no help at all here. My wife is thrilled with the assembled island and it looks good and useful. In spite of the above issues, we're happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Harold White

customer_reviews.title: Damaged,  but still a nice piece for the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged, but after getting it most of the way put together, we have just decided to avoid the hassle and live with it. It came well packed and I think it was just mishandled by the shippers, which has been and issue in our area lately. It is a great addition to my kitchen and overall I’m quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Grad student

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and made with real wood.
customer_reviews.text: This kitchen. Island is perfect for what I was looking for. I was able to put it together by myself, which was awesome. It took me about 3 hours, but I was building it while tending to two children. This whole thing is made of real wood. Lots of storage and go perfect with my kitchen. Now I just need 2 stools to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Definitely easy to assemble. The product came in 3 boxes (heavy) but wrapped with care. It took about 2 hours. Looks great and has good storage space. A small problem was 2 of the 4 knobs that came couldn’t be assembled properly. The nail was too short and I had to buy new nails. Very small problem and cost about a dollar extra to fix.
customer_reviews.author: J. Shenouda

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this island
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this island! It's all that I had hoped for and more. I shopped online for months before settling on this one. The two cupboards are roomy, and the little display shelved on the ends add a nice place to store or display things. The two drawers open and close smoothly. We did hire the "Amazon professional assembler", since my husband and I decided that our marriage the price of that!! (we are not good co-assemblers!!). ;)
customer_reviews.author: Chambo

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Island
customer_reviews.text: The item came in three boxes. All boxes were well padded and no damage to the product. The entire top (including drawers) comes pre-assembled. It took my wife and I less than an hour to assemble. Once assembled it is very solid and sturdy. Would have given 5 stars, but one of the doors catches on the top and is difficult to open. Otherwise, this is a very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas D Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Replacement for our kitchen table
customer_reviews.text: Our family decided to order this island for our kitchen since we were no longer using our kitchen table and chairs. The island has definitely suited our needs and use the extension on a daily basis. It is beautifully made and has given us the additional storage for our kitchen-we receive compliments all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon May

customer_reviews.title: High Quality and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I are so impressed with this Kitchen Island. The quality of the material is much better than expected. We shopped around and this is as good if not better that the furniture stores that we looked at and much less expensive. I was amazed at how well the assembly procedures were. The entire top and drawers were one piece already assembled which made putting this together a breeze in less than an hour. The trim and oak top are outstanding. Everybody that has seen this is amazed that we purchased this online. We are very happy and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Binder

customer_reviews.title: GREAT !!!
customer_reviews.text: This is as advertised. It cane in on time. It had to be put together but the instructions were very clear and easy to follow. although it needs two people to put it together, I did it by myself in about 3 hours. Each part was fully protected dunning shipping. It was scratch free. It is all wood, not particle board. Although it does not come with wheels, $15 at Harbor Freight took care of that situation. I do recommend this Kitchen Island and would but it again for family members.
customer_reviews.author: Eagle_eye7

customer_reviews.title: and I have to say it is amazing. Very solid
customer_reviews.text: I have had this island for over a year now, and I have to say it is amazing. Very solid, the top is really beautiful, and it adds a ton of counter space and storage for my kitchen at a great price. It was moderately difficult for one person to put together but not impossible, just slow going, it would certainly help to have 2 people. Other than that though, it has been great.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Vander Leest

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful  island
customer_reviews.text: I love this island over the holidays had many complements when I ordered I had read so many reviews I wasn't sure what I would get what I got was a beautiful island my husband and I put it together in about three hours tip check all pieces before starting follow directions use a level and have a second person as the top is heavy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Softwood
customer_reviews.text: Was able to assemble within an hour, even with a toddler jumping into the cupboards every time I turned around. Love the looks and storage, wish the top wasn’t a soft wood. I plan on replacing it later on with something sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and an asset to our kitchen
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty easy to assemble. Having someone to help lift the heavier pieces was helpful but all in all I put it together myself. It looks great in my kitchen and holds a small amount of items. I'm glad that I purchased this and recommend it .
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Waters-Burghy

customer_reviews.title: Great island minus the different stain shades.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been shopping for a kitchen island for a very long time. I finally settled in this one. The island is greater than expected for the price. It was assembled in just under two hours. The only issue encountered which put a real damper in my excitement was that the leaf was a different stain than the counter top. I have addressed it with the request of a new leaf matching the countertop and am now waiting rectification.
customer_reviews.author: Laurinda De Pina

customer_reviews.title: Looks like the picture and is functional, but some details could be improved on.
customer_reviews.text: Was alot of steps to put together but easy enough directions to follow. Has good storage and looks nice. The extended island top could be sturdier. The magnets holding the cabinet doors shut had to be replaced they were not strong enough. The shelves on either end seem to be about a quarter inch too short so they don't fit as snug as I'd hoped. Overall looks nice and functionally works nice, but you'll notice a few small details that could be improved.
customer_reviews.author: Lyle

customer_reviews.title: One of my best purchases on amazon
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases I’ve made on amazon. Yes it has those weird pinholes but honestly it doesn’t take away from the beauty at all. It took about 30 minutes to put together and it’s very solid. Average bar stools fit great under the drop leaf. It’s bigger than you think which is awesome. Absolutely love this.
customer_reviews.author: C. Areal

customer_reviews.title: I'm not sure how else it could have come so ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how else it could have come so I won't complain about the size or weight of the 3 pieces. It is exactly how it appears in the photos. Before I confirmed the purchase I looked at all of the "actual" customer photos. It is my proudest buy from Amazon. I ordered specifically for additional cabinet space. Although it doesn't offer a ton, just really two additional spaces and a couple of drawers. The real bonus is the additional counter space and the drop leaf for seating. After a month of use I have started to let the leaf down just to ensure my kids aren't applying too much pressure on a consistent basis.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Jansen

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and is of decent quality. Assembly is not hard but must use caution because the metal inserts where machine screws attach are not of great design. Easy to strip. The counter top overhangs 2" all around so with the leaf's 12" length you get a total of 14" on the leaf end of top.
customer_reviews.author: Tom J

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, needed 2 people to assemble, seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Have only had it for about a week now, and it mostly looks great. When we opened the package, one of the long thin pieces had a very visible crack, and since it's an exterior piece, it's noticeable. Other than that, it's a very attractive island and has really helped with counter space and storage in our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Island expands storage
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was relatively easy. All parts were packaged well. I’m most pleased with the additional storage this island provides. The internal cabinets allow you numerous options with the shelves to accommodate your needs. I purchased the white version and it matches my existing cabinetry perfectly. This is well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi T

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy unit
customer_reviews.text: Very nice unit, nice size. Good storage, surprisingly deep cabinets. Only downside is the wood top scratches so you have to protect it. Note this item is not white white. It’s a slightly off white cream color. Took two very handy men an hour to assemble, so I wouldn’t call that easy.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain View Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This island is perfect for my kitchen. I looked for a long time, and at many others before I ordered this. It is expensive, but I went with the payment plan so I could get what I wanted. You can’t beat 18 months interest free payments. Thanks, Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, quality and sturdy island
customer_reviews.text: This is heavy and made well. It was so easy to put together compared to some stuff we have bought. Every piece is clearly marked and instructions easy to follow. It looks great in my kitchen. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Survivalwoman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Kitchen Island
customer_reviews.text: I'm delighted with this item I had purchase from Amazon. It's an impressive piece of furniture very comfortable for the small space I have in my kitchen. My husband didn't have any problem to assemble this item. I highly recommended this kitchen Island. The price was terrific too.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Vaccaro

customer_reviews.title: Great size and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This island is beautiful and a great size. I love the pull-out and cannot wait to get some barstools to really use it. With 2 people the assembly was fairly easy. Came in several boxes and it is very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: B Marie

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST ISLAND FOR AN INCREDIBLE PRICE!!!! SERIOUSLY WORTH IT!!
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is WOW! I have received so many compliments on this since putting it together. This is definitely not cheaply made - the wood is very thick and heavy - a super sturdy island. Most people assume I paid well over $1000 for this due to the high quality. It is perfect and everything you could want for a kitchen island. If you are debating or have been looking for one - look no further, this is it! Oh and the assembly literally took me with another person about an hour - so easy - the base and top with drawers comes assembled and the rest is just about a 7-8 step instruction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations. Believe it was overpriced. 3 stars because it was cut an additional $25, 3 days after we purchased the unit and they refused to reimburse the difference, but even then it was still overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: EW

customer_reviews.title: I have photos if anyone would like to see
customer_reviews.text: There were 3 pieces missing, I had to fabricate the missing ones to finalize the construction. Also, there was damage to the wood top! I have photos if anyone would like to see them
customer_reviews.author: daryl s frey

customer_reviews.title: Great piece.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent manufacture, beautifully crafted unit paying attention to all detail. A lot of room for storage. Comfortable sits two adults for breakfast in the kitchen. I added a pair of stools that match very well with color and quality. Good and recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mario G.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This island is beautiful and very sturdy. My husband put it together without any trouble at all. It is perfect for my kitchen. Everyone who visits compliments it. The shelves are not very deep, but I have some small recipe books on one. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Yogi Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful centerpiece
customer_reviews.text: We get many compliments on this piece of furniture. It’s very versatile, especially in our older home that lacks counter and cabinet space. It was fairly easy to assemble, but definitely takes two people. I didn’t order the set that had the chairs, and I do recommend that you do to save the hassle of getting them later.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Moore

customer_reviews.title: Check boxes  when you get them before  driver  leaves
customer_reviews.text: Came all broken. Sent it back got a new one that one was also broken.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love. Came quickly in 3 big boxes. The top piece is a very thick piece of nice real wood. Took husband about 2 hours to put together on his own. He is strong but did struggle a bit lifting some of boxes. Should have had help but stubborn. Only complaint is the doors don't line up very well and I need to lift them slightly to get them to close. Not sure if it's craftsmanship or the husband. But overall beautiful. Many compliments looks more expensive like from actual furniture store and not put together.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen island
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! It's solid wood..no particle board here. Lots of storage for my china and silver. The side shelves are perfect for storing my espresso capsules/syrups. I also store some serving items as well. Perfect as a buffet and breakfast bar for 2. Husband put it together in about 2 hours. It's amazing and totally worth the price. Cheaper than other "outlet" stores.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: I really bought this and put it together MYSELF!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am completely blown away by this island....what a great purchase. Very sturdy and very very easy to assemble. All the pieces and hardware are adequately marked with letters. The instructions are easy to read and understand. I put it together alone while listening to some music. Lol. Took me about 2 hours but that includes clean up! The styrofoam that it came packed in was a little pain in the a**. Kept sticking to the pieces making for a little bit of a mess. Getting back to the island itself, gorgeous! I highly recommend this island. This is a real review!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hector G

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: We just love our kitchen island. Have been using it for awhile now, and the top is getting a little scratched up but it's holding up nicely. Still have yet to buy a bench for it, but I think I found a pretty close match by googling kitchen island benches.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Rodriguez Morales

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. I must say I was super impressed with this island. It is even better than I expected.it shipped right away and arrived just before a family gathering and I was so happy. It comes with the large pices already put together so my husband and I put it together in a snap. Looks beautiful in our small cabin kitchen. Couldn’t be any more perfect, and I couldn’t be any more pleased. Great company and great product. A++++++++ from me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality table
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bar top table for our kitchen. It is super heavy and made very well, not cheap particle board. It comes in 3 very large boxes and is heavy. You will definitely need at least two people to put this together. Awesome find way to go amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is what you want if you agree with the style.  The quality is there.
customer_reviews.text: This item was easier to put together than you might think. I was stunned at how sturdy it is. We have been using it for over a year and these photos were taken after a year of use. The hinged bar that folds up and down is the only weak point but it has done well with two adults and three kids.
customer_reviews.author: Just The Facts

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love this island, it is EXACTLY what is pictured and described. I have received multiple compliments on this island. This was not difficult to assemble at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with this Island
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, did take two of us to put it together but with that said it is because it is real wood which makes it a little heavy. Absolutely beautiful addition to our kitchen. Great Customer service as well. Top had a scratched area and a drawer had a broken slide. Within days of reporting our issue we had a new top including a new set of drawers delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Merry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This product is the 1st product of heavy duty furniture purchased from amazon that truly exceeded expectations. Assembly was a breeze and the item truly is high quality and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: ncellon

customer_reviews.title: I loved this at first
customer_reviews.text: I loved this at first , but now usingit for 6 months the piece where it goes up and down it is not supported enough and is now leaning ! Be careful with this bc the it's only a 30 return window . Def not worth 600 didn't last ) months
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Island dream
customer_reviews.text: Love the island lot taller than I expected but perfect match for my counter heights. Best to have 2 people to put it together 1 might be a struggle. Packaged well but still had an indentation on the top edge.
customer_reviews.author: John Steinebach

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Sturday overall
customer_reviews.text: Used it for 2 years now. Pros: Looks great. Sturday overall. Cons: The top wooden part is now taking some hits. A lot of of space is wasted and I feel that the island is a little bigger than it should be Leaf is weak. Do not rest your body weight on it. Either due to our fault during assembly or manufacturing defect, one of the doors is slanted and doesn't attach to both magnets, so doesn't close always.
customer_reviews.author: Tapan

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this addition to my kitchen. It had complete instructions to assemble including stickers on each piece to make it easy and quick to put together. The cost seemed a little high until it came and I realized that it was sturdy and beautiful in it's design. DEFINITELY worth the time and cost!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: An awesome unit. Looks great in the kitchen . Storage is great. Sturdiness is great. Easy to follow install directions..Superior to any product we've Ever assembled!!!!! Easy to follow directions, with each piece marked. One of our Best purchases ever!!
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: It is heavy & does take two people.
customer_reviews.text: My husband & I got it put together quickly with no problems at all. It is a beautiful piece of furniture. I have it in my kitchen & it matches my cabinets perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie S Hampker

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but fairly satisfied
customer_reviews.text: We don’t have prime and it was delivered in just a few days! Well packaged... delivered in 3 boxes. Sturdy and directions were easy to follow. It did take a while to put together. There was a small dent on the surface. But it will do for the purpose we got it for.
customer_reviews.author: twix

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We loooove this island! I Cannot believe the quality of it for the price. My husband put it together in an evening, said it went together well and quite easily. It's really beautiful and has added much needed storage and seating space to our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: A. Austin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, looks great
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful kitchen island! It only took about an hour for my husband to assemble, and the assembly was very straightforward. He did need my help a couple of times to hold pieces while he tightened up screws, so it's best to have another person to help put it together. Everything fit together perfectly. We chose not to add the eating extension and the little shelves on the sides and it looks great without them. You can do it either way. Really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Less floor!  More counter!
customer_reviews.text: I love my island!! It is perfect in my kitchen which had so little counter space. Now my granddaughter and I can do Sunday dinner together! Also I love that it sits flat on the floor. Less to mop! The only negative was that it shipped with two left doors but I worked around it, turned the door upside down and patched the tiny hole for the knob. That was easier than getting an extra door!
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: Wife love's the look and style but she is not happy. Happy Wife Happy Life that's not happening now
customer_reviews.text: Top started to split two month's old never would have thought i needed extended warranty with this type of product, Wife love's the look and style but she is not happy. Happy Wife Happy Life that's not happening now.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: We received this Island at Approx 12:20 pm and had it assembled at 2:20 pm. This is an extremely well engineered and thought out piece of furniture. It is simply gorgeous in all it's detail and finish. We are awaiting our buffet with hutch that will arrive next Tuesday June 2nd from Home Styles, and expect it to be just as beautiful. This is an excellent piece that we are using as a side board rather than as an island due to space concerns. Wonderful!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis530

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: This kitchen island is exactly what I needed! It was packaged well and nothing got damaged. The instructions and illustrations were very helpful! The hardware was easy to use! It is very well built and also very sturdy! Also it is a beautiful addition to my kitchen! I also ordered two bar chairs to go with it! Thank you Homestyles!
customer_reviews.author: Roger M.

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Review
customer_reviews.text: Another great review This Island is perfect for my kitchen The quality of this island exceeded my expectation The color I purchased was black and the color is true. I had someone help me put this together and with two people we methodically put it together in about an hour. I must say this is a great addition to our renovation.
customer_reviews.author: SMR

customer_reviews.title: It came in perfect condition and well packaged.
customer_reviews.text: Grrrrrreat quality, so easy to ensamble, do not hire any professional help, very pricey, you just need two people at one point of ensamble process, it only took me 1 hour and 45 minutes. It practically comes somehow pre-ensambled, drawers are already attached to the top part of table, doors does not need any tool at all... highly recommend, if I needed to buy again I would do it with no doubt... It came so, so fast, I received it in only four days after I placed my order... 😁. Thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Lettie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: We were unable to assemble it because we didn’t have “levers” that were supposed to come with it. The whole thing just cracked
customer_reviews.author: homyaks

customer_reviews.title: How did I manage without it?
customer_reviews.text: This works extremely well in my kitchen. It's a good solid piece of furniture. Two teenage boys put it together in less than an hour, but they had the common sense to read the instructions, lay out all the parts and check that they were all there before starting. Don't forget to protect the top when using it.
customer_reviews.author: GJArmy

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations!!!
customer_reviews.text: This island far exceeded my expectations. It was extremely well packaged and arrived with no damage what so ever. I took about 15 minutes to unpack and separate the parts. My daughter and her boyfriend put it together in about 30 minutes. It has added well needed storage in my kitchen and looks far more expensive than it was . It just really makes my mid 90's kitchen look like a 21century kitchen and I am very happy. I would certainly recommend this product to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great island.
customer_reviews.text: Went together very easily. I assembled it alone in less than 90 mins. It looks great, giving great contrast to my mostly white kitchen. I have received many comments so far.
customer_reviews.author: Capt

product_meta.title: Americana White & Distressed Oak Kitchen Island by Home Styles
product_meta.description: Color:White and Oak| Design:Kitchen IslandVersatile, functional and stylish all describe this kitchen island with its White finished body and coordinating cottage oak finished top. Enhancing the overall style, The top features hand applied physical and finished distressing. The island not only provides added kitchen work surface and storage but with its 11-1/2-inch breakfast bar extended also provides a convenient place to grab a bite to eat or enjoy a morning cup of coffee. Find adjustable shelving on both ends of the island as well as two utility drawers and two cabinets, each with two adjustable shelves yielding lots of storage. Construction is of sustainable hardwood with a clear coat finish helping to protect against wear from normal use. Requires assembly. Measures 49-3/4-inch width by 26-1/2-inch depth by 36-1/2-inch Height.
feature_bullets: Kitchen Island with raised detail cabinet doors

Overall dimensions – 49.75” W x 26.5” D x 36.5” H | Leaf extended – 36” D | Leaf weight limit – 50 lbs. | Top dimensions – 48.25” W x 25” D x 1.75” H | Storage Area behind Doors – 12.25” W x 18.5” D x 25” H | Counter stools min height – 24”

Drawer dimensions – 10” W x 16.5” D x 3.75” H | Drawer weight limit – 30 lbs. | Shelf dimensions (Outside) – 11.25” W x 6” D x 0.75” H | Shelf dimensions (Inside) – 12” W x 17.75” D x 0.75” H | Shelf adjustments – 2” | Shelf weight limit – 50 lbs.
Constructed of solid hardwoods and engineered wood | Features include convenient drop leaf that raises to provide dining/serving space
Comes in a rich white and distressed oak finished top for an aged look. The use of power tools above eight volts is not recommended on our products

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars832 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
